#summary Helper components for serializating objects to NSString and vice-versa

= Introduction =

This section contains [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Serializer utility components] for NSString to object and vice-versa serialization.


= Details =

Components in this section include:
  * [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Serializer/OxICSerializer.m OxICSerializer], which is a common protocol to be implemented by serializers.
  * [http://code.google.com/p/oxeniphonecommons/source/browse/trunk/main/Classes/Serializer/OxICJsonSerializer.m OxICJsonSerializer], a JSON serializer implementation.
  * XML serializer: Some day!!! :P
